[user]
    name = Test User
    email = test@example.com

[core]
    autocrlf = input
    quotepath = false

# {linux-
[core]
    editor = vim
    pager = less

[alias]
    co = checkout
    br = branch
    ci = commit
    st = status
    unstage = reset HEAD --
    last = log -1 HEAD
    visual = !gitk
# -linux}

# {macos-
[core]
    editor = nano
    pager = less

[alias]
    co = checkout
    br = branch
    ci = commit
    st = status
    unstage = reset HEAD --
    last = log -1 HEAD
    visual = !gitx
# -macos}

# {windows-
[core]
    editor = notepad
    autocrlf = true

[alias]
    co = checkout
    br = branch
    ci = commit
    st = status
    unstage = reset HEAD --
    last = log -1 HEAD
    visual = !gitk
# -windows}

[push]
    default = simple

[pull]
    rebase = true
